1_13EUVTHXUNK46bs3QXB8AtJ6sxPXcSQh31.body:
I'm semi serious about cryptocurrencies. I currently own some Bitcoin, Doge, Dash and Monero. The good thing is I've been purchasing VPS, VPN and T-Shirts with my cryptocurrencies.

Always use a wallet which is installed on your computer, very risky to use a web based wallet because you don't have 100% control over it.
